name: Spam Filter
title: Spam Filter

api_list.name: message
api_list.description: scans message to see if it is spam
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spam-filter2.p.rapidapi.com/message/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spam-filter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://spam-filter2.p.rapidapi.com/message/"
